data.lyric:
[ti:Vice City]
[ar:XXXTentacion]
[al:All Of X]
[by:]

[00:00.00]vice city (Explicit) - XXXTentacion
[00:00.08]Lyrics by：XXXTENTACION
[00:00.16]Composed by：XXXTENTACION
[00:00.25]Laura Mvula/XXXTENTACION：
[00:00.33]Hey there you looking for a brighter season
[00:06.21]Yeah
[00:06.79]Need to lay your burden down
[00:09.95]Haha
[00:11.28]Hey there you drowning in a helpless feeling
[00:16.75]Dutty young blood sucka'
[00:18.03]Buried under deeper ground
[00:20.24]Uh
[00:23.48]Yeah okay uh uh yeah
[00:32.94]I seem depressed always being bothered never less
[00:35.95]Keeping me out of prison and putting me to the test
[00:38.58]They ask me what is happiness you write it on a check
[00:41.39]Or you feel it on the sweat when your d**k is in the breast huh
[00:44.14]Laura Mvula/XXXTENTACION：
[00:44.55]Uoy ereht yeh uh give me a sec look
[00:47.46]Nwo ruoy no er'uoy dna tuo og sthgil eht nehw
[00:49.97]Uoy ereht yeh okay okay
[00:53.00]Nwo ruoy no er'uoy dna tuo og sthgil eht nehw
[00:56.75]If death is what it seems why is it so vividly portrayed within my dreams
[01:01.11]The fear of understanding the Devil's running his course
[01:03.74]Hatred's not received it's coming straight from the source
[01:06.03]Remorse as this time becomes a factor minds full of greed exposing your benefactors
[01:11.06]Backwards pace backwards everybody is superficial
[01:13.94]Only breaching the surface surface upon the Earth
[01:16.56]And flames engulf the Earth and prized possessions they incinerate
[01:20.20]This is far beyond any director tried to demonstrate
[01:23.11]See the record here's the record take the record set it straight
[01:25.58]Perplexed only receive slumber when at Heaven's gates
[01:28.33]And this is fairly simple for your breath try and contemplate your converses
[01:31.85]Hesitate and navigate your inner traits
[01:34.30]Back to a time where minds were just matter
[01:36.49]If you stated opinions then bones would begin to shatter
[01:39.43]It didn't matter back then
[01:40.71]Cause there was no reacting acting up
[01:43.01]Chevy in black Accura
[01:44.84]Accurate facts put the black in fact
[01:46.88]If you thought that you are free you should disregard that
[01:49.81]All facts
[01:50.49]Laura Mvula/XXXTENTACION：
[01:51.18]Nwo ruoy no er'uoy dna tuo og sthgil eht nehw
[01:52.87]Uoy ereht yeh
[01:53.50]Young X'ster call me a young Dexter
[01:56.78]Nwo ruoy no er'uoy dna tuo og sthgil eht nehw
[01:58.20]Uoy ereht yeh
[01:58.64]My hypothesis is-is death ain't s**t
[02:02.67]Uoy ereht yeh
[02:03.10]I'd rather die than be alive in this life
[02:04.73]Nwo ruoy no er'uoy dna tuo og sthgil eht nehw
[02:06.11]Honestly full of trife and strife
[02:07.79]Nwo ruoy no er'uoy dna tuo og sthgil eht nehw
[02:09.25]Uoy ereht yeh
[02:12.06]Jah
[02:12.69]Laura Mvula：
[02:13.00]Hey there you
[02:14.41]Try to stand up on your own two feet and stumblin'
[02:17.98]Hey there you
[02:19.70]Try to stand up on your own two feet and stumblin'
[02:23.47]Hey there you
[02:25.26]Try to stand up on your own two feet and stumblin'
[02:29.01]Through the sky
[02:31.58]Through-through the sky

[02:34.72]Nwo ruoy no er'uoy dna tuo og sthgil eht nehw
[02:37.47]Uoy ereht yeh
[02:40.13]Nwo ruoy no er'uoy dna tuo og sthgil eht nehw

[02:49.10]Uoy ereht yeh
[02:51.20]Nwo ruoy no er'uoy dna tuo og sthgil eht nehW
[02:55.11]Uoy ereht yeh

data.trans:
[ti:Vice City]
[ar:XXXTentacion]
[al:All Of X]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.08]//
[00:00.16]//
[00:00.25]//
[00:00.33]嘿 看过来 你渴望找到更加阳光明媚的日子
[00:06.21]//
[00:06.79]你需要放下肩上的担子
[00:09.95]//
[00:11.28]嘿 看过来 你被某种无助的感觉吞没
[00:16.75]Dutty 年轻的吸血鬼
[00:18.03]被埋在更深的地底
[00:20.24]//
[00:23.48]//
[00:32.94]我看上去垂头丧气 时刻被人打扰 从没有过好转
[00:35.95]让我免于牢狱之灾 让我接受测试
[00:38.58]他们问我什么是幸福 幸福就是在支票上签名的时候
[00:41.39]或者是在你大汗淋漓 和某个身材火辣的女孩缠绵的时候
[00:44.14]//
[00:44.55]给我一秒钟 看看
[00:47.46]//
[00:49.97]//
[00:53.00]//
[00:56.75]如果死亡就是那样平淡的事情 为何它会如此生动地呈现在我梦中
[01:01.11]因为知道恶魔就在来找我的路上 我恐惧万分
[01:03.74]仇恨不被认同为正常的情感 它来自于一切的源头
[01:06.03]悔恨 这一次成了其中一个诱因 贪得无厌 对你的恩人恩将仇报
[01:11.06]后退 再后退 每个人都很肤浅
[01:13.94]我的力量只能影响到表面 地球的表面
[01:16.56]火焰吞没了地球 珍贵的财产 化为灰烬
[01:20.20]这远比任何灾难电影中的画面更加夸张
[01:23.11]看看这记录 来看看这记录 记载了下来 简单直接
[01:25.58]迷惘 你只有上了天堂之后才有打盹的时间
[01:28.33]这相比继续呼吸来说要简单得多 试着仔细想想 你的匡威鞋
[01:31.85]考虑片刻 探究你内心的品质
[01:34.30]回溯时间 回到只有自己内心的想法才最重要的时候
[01:36.49]你如果摆出了观点 身体会表达强烈的抗拒
[01:39.43]在当时来说 这种事并不重要
[01:40.71]因为那时候不会有别人的异样反应
[01:43.01]黑色的雪佛兰 准确来说
[01:44.84]事实上真正的现实都是黑色一片
[01:46.88]你如果觉得自己得到了自由 你应该漠视
[01:49.81]所有的现实
[01:50.49]//
[01:51.18]//
[01:52.87]//
[01:53.50]Young X'ster 叫我小德克斯特
[01:56.78]//
[01:58.20]//
[01:58.64]我的假说就是死亡 不是什么奇怪的东西
[02:02.67]//
[02:03.10]我宁愿去死 也不想继续这样生活下去
[02:04.73]//
[02:06.11]说实话 我这一生满是挣扎与冲突
[02:07.79]//
[02:09.25]//
[02:12.06]//
[02:12.69]//
[02:13.00]嘿 这里
[02:14.41]试着靠自己站起来 跌跌撞撞地前行
[02:17.98]嘿 这里
[02:19.70]试着靠自己站起来 跌跌撞撞地前行
[02:23.47]嘿 这里
[02:25.26]试着靠自己站起来 跌跌撞撞地前行

[02:31.58]飞过天空
